title: String Quantum Symmetries and the SL(2,Z) Group
abstract: We prove, using arguments relying only on the "special K\"ahler" structure of the moduli space of the Calabi-Yau three-fold, that in the case of one single modulus the quantum modular group of the string effective action corresponding to Calabi-Yau vacua can not be SL(2,${Z\kern -4.6pt Z}$).
